description:
Get back out on the trails with this 12-speed cassette. Designed for use with gravel and mountain bikes, this cassette offers lots of mechanical advantage to help turn those mountains into mole hills.

  • 454% range offers a ton mechanical advantage
  • Alloy spider keeps weight low
  • 7075 aluminum 42T and 50T rings with steel used on rings 11-36T
  • Shimano HG-spline compatibility
  • Works with both Shimano and SRAM drivetrains
name: SunRace MZ90 12 Speed 11-50T Cassette HG Type
